questions.question: How many people does it take to, what is it on the scroll, light bulb?
Like, do you think there's truly great songs that you've written that you just didn't notice how great they are?
What was your dad, at which point did you begin to share it with your dad?
I was like in a place where I was like, is this good or bad?
As an artist, when a producer comes in, you're like, whoa, whoa, whoa, what are your intentions?
Okay, it's really hurt me, but were there any good things that came out of Mormonism?
